channel.title: Books in the news
channel.description:
A quick look at newly published material and books of current interest.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Do You Sleep In The Nude?
item.description: In program number 377, Robert Orem talks about Rex Reed's "Do You Sleep In The Nude?"
